{{VO/Story

|character           = Hu Tao

|vo_01_01_title      = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = Yoh, now why might you be looking for me, hm? Oh, you didn't know? I'm the 77th Director of the [[Wangsheng Funeral Parlor]], Hu Tao. Though by the looks of you... Radiant glow, healthy posture... Yes, you're definitely here for something other than that which falls within my regular line of work, aren't you?
|vo_01_01_actualtx   = Yoh, now '''just''' why might you be looking for me, hm? Oh, you didn't know? I'm the 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, Hu Tao. Though by the looks of you... Radiant glow, healthy posture... Yes, you're definitely here for something other than that which falls within my regular line of work, aren't you?

|vo_02_01_title      = Chat: Wangsheng Funeral Parlor

|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Taking a Break.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = When the sun's out, bathe in sunlight. But when the moon's out, bathe in moonlight~

|vo_05_01_title      = About {name}: Name
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Name.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = Hu as in "Who put me in this coffin?" and Tao as in "I can't {{Not a Typo|geT OUt}}!" Hehe... No, not funny?
|vo_05_02_title      = About {name}: Favorite Tricks
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Favorite Tricks.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = Lemme show you some fire tricks. First... Fire! And then... Whoosh! Fire butterfly! Be free!

|vo_06_01_title      = About Us: Curiosity
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Curiosity.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = You've been all over, so you must've seen a lot. When you've got the time, tell me your story, yea?
|vo_06_02_title      = About Us: Night
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Night.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = Run around all you like during the day, but you should be careful during the night. When I'm not around, best keep your wits about you.
|vo_06_03_title      = About Us: Helper
|vo_06_03_friendship = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Helper.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = Need a hand, need a hand? I'm here! If you need some assistance, I'm here to give it my all to the very end!
|vo_06_04_title      = About Us: Battle
|vo_06_04_friendship = 6
|vo_06_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Battle.ogg
|vo_06_04_tx         = Fighting's a pain. For me, it's not an objective so much as a means to an end. Using the means to reach the end, to fight for that which I will not compromise on &mdash; it's in this way that you and I are the same.

|vo_07_01_title      = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = Vision... Vision...? Oh, this thing? Yeah, whatever...
|vo_07_02_title      = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = We are entrusted by the people to loyally see out their wishes. Wangsheng Funeral Parlor is special, in that it carries a dual responsibility, to those both of this realm, and the next.
|vo_07_03_title      = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = Some plants only grow in gloomier spots with ample moonlight. You ever seen any? Oh, no? Well, I'll have to show you next time.

|vo_08_01_title      = About [[Zhongli]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Zhongli.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = Zhongli looks young, but his personality is a bit dusty. Knows everything, but doesn't fret over anything. Hmm... Couldn't be that he's a...Hehe, forget it, whatever.
|vo_08_01_mention    = Zhongli
|vo_08_02_title      = About [[Qiqi]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Qiqi.ogg
|vo_08_02_mention    = Qiqi
|vo_08_02_tx         = Have you seen Qiqi? Tell me where she is, quickly. I need to go seal her away, hee-hee!
|vo_08_03_title      = About [[Baizhu]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Baizhu.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = Baizhu? Ugh, that guy...
|vo_08_03_mention    = Baizhu
|vo_08_04_title      = About [[Ningguang]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Ningguang.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = Tianquan Ningguang... Well-off, a radiant gaze, exquisite face, in the know and capable of anything!
|vo_08_04_mention    = Ningguang
|vo_08_05_title      = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = Beidou is well-known in [[Liyue]]. She doesn't know me, but that's cool, me just knowing about her is enough. Aw man... I really do wanna make friends with her.
|vo_08_05_mention    = Beidou
|vo_08_06_title      = About [[Xingqiu]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xingqiu.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = I hear master Xingqiu is writing a book? Standard novella, or a ghost story? I think I should go tell him about all the things I run into &mdash; that'd make for a really good read!
|vo_08_06_mention    = Xingqiu
|vo_08_07_title      = About [[Chongyun]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Chongyun.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = All yang and no yin? Who knew such people existed in this world.
|vo_08_07_actualtx   = Positive energies in unity between yin and yang... Who knew such people existed in this world.
|vo_08_07_mention    = Chongyun
|vo_08_08_title      = About [[Xiao]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xiao.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = What would I know of the [[adepti]]? Ai-yai-yai, that kind of stuff is top-secret! Don't come asking me about it!
|vo_08_08_mention    = Xiao
|vo_08_09_title      = About [[Keqing]]
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Keqing.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = The Yuheng, Keqing... she's quite hard to talk to. She's so uptight, hehe... Really makes me wanna mess with her. She wouldn't knock me in the head with her sword though, right? Or would she...?
|vo_08_09_mention    = Keqing
|vo_08_10_title      = About [[Xiangling]]
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xiangling.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = Xiangling's a riot! Only a little "boo" and she jumps, she's so easy to scare! Being in the industry that I am, I just love these kinds of people the most. Gotta keep it in check though, in case [[Guoba]] ends up toasting me instead.
|vo_08_10_mention    = Xiangling,Guoba
|vo_08_11_title      = About [[Yun Jin]]
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yun Jin.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = Yun Jin always appears so graceful on formal occassions, but you'd be surprised how friendly she is in private! I made a bet with her once, and the loser had to sing lyrics of the winner's choice in their own singing style. My my, I wish you could have heard her operatic version of the Hilitune!
|vo_08_11_mention    = Yun Jin
|vo_08_12_title      = About [[Shenhe]]
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Shenhe.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = She is quite the fascinating individual, completely different from anyone else I've encountered. Do you think if I started eating divine herbs and drinking the dew of the mountains every single day, I'd be able to look as pure and pristine as she does?
|vo_08_12_mention    = Shenhe
|vo_08_13_title      = About [[Lan Yan]]
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_tx         = Lan Yan, you say? She's a lot stronger than  she looks. She claims to only know a few of the Qimen arts, but she can get rid of dangerous things like fetor and illnesses! Aiya, there's only one problem... Removing all the bad stuff and making everyone all fit and strong isn't exactly good for the funeral business!
|vo_08_13_mention    = Lan Yan

|vo_09_01_title      = More About {name}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = ♪Silly-churl, billy-churl, silly-billy [[hilichurl]]. Frilly-churl, willy-churl, frilly-willy hilichurl♪ Ah, hehe...
|vo_09_02_title      = More About {name}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = Versemonger of the darkest alleys &mdash; that's me!
|vo_09_03_title      = More About {name}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = If you ask me, there's nothing hard or scary about working at Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, it's just a pain is all. It's a shame &mdash; others see us going out to work at night and just don't understand &mdash; and that's what scares them. *sigh* You all just don't understand!
|vo_09_04_title      = More About {name}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = I'm Wangsheng Funeral Parlor's 77th Funeral Director, [[Old Hu|my grandfather]] was the 75th. First thing I took over was funeral affairs. Haha, surprising huh? And just like that, it's already been a few years... Time really does go by so quickly.
|vo_09_04_mention    = Old Hu
|vo_09_05_title      = More About {name}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = Balance must be maintained, and yet destinies remain variable. Death has its own rules, and yet is still hard to predict. Remember &mdash; no matter where, no matter when, no matter what the reason &mdash; one should never poke fun at death. Only once you know and respect death can you truly understand the value of life.

|vo_10_01_title      = {name}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = A bright moon aloft amid the vast, clear skies... Moments like these are just perfect for writing poetry.
|vo_10_02_title      = {name}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = *sigh* I gotta find something fun to do... Sitting around doing nothing is a fate worse than death.
|vo_10_03_title      = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = ♪La~la~la~ Steamed fish with a side of prawn dumplings~
|vo_10_04_title      = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = [[Qingxin]] [[Slime Condensate]]... Bleugh... Surely this is Xiangling getting payback...
|vo_10_04_mention    = Xiangling

|vo_11_01_title      = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = Splendid, splendid! Now, allow me to compose a poem in loving memory of this dish.
|vo_11_02_title      = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = Sure you don't want my help? C'mon, it's a great deal: cook twice the amount in the same time!
|vo_11_03_title      = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = Ugh, I declare this dish dead, rest in peace.

|vo_12_01_title      = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = Tonight the stars are dazzling and the moon majestic, it must be a special day... But just what day could it be... Haha, I know, I know! It's your birthday! It really is a great day.

|vo_13_01_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = O-ya? O-ya-ya-ya?
|vo_13_02_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = Yeah, this is good, thanks!
|vo_13_03_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = I never imagined that I, Hu Tao, could ever be like this. Energy like a rushing torrent, a heart soaring like a gliding eagle! I feel great!
|vo_13_04_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = If I reach my full physical potential, then the next test is of the heart. It's largely thanks to you that I've been able to step foot into this uncharted territory. It is here that heart and soul are as one like clouds. Death is a constant for all among the multitudes that sit beneath the heavens.
}}
